duties_responsibilities.duty: Support delivery and support of high-quality Identity and Access Management services while adhering to client standards and best practices.
Work on installation and configurations, and ensure thorough understanding and work experience for Single Sign-On, Access management, Identity Federation, Multi-factor authentication.
Write scripts and develop code to fetch assertion values from multiple data sources, and work with ForgeRock UI customization.
Handle On-time provisioning / deprovisioning using ForgeRock OpenIDM (Identity management) system.
Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote freight and logistics services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
